precaution: Clear your surroundings to make sure you do not knock over any items.
instruction: Put the scoop in your right hand.
Rest your right forearm on the table.
Keep your right forearm in contact with the table and turn your right arm so your palm is facing up and the scoop is towards the right.
Turn your right arm so your palm is facing down towards the table and the scoop is towards the left.
Repeat these steps one more time.
